OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD SOUTH-EAST FEDERATION OF TOWNSWOMENS GUILDS

Desc.entry: Aims to advance the education of women irrespective of race, creed or party so as to enable them to make the best contribution towards the common good. Holds annual lunch in April.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 1st Mon in Jan and alternate months (except Bank Holidays when the meeting is held on 2nd Mon in the month)
